thread.title: U.S. to Block Tax-Law Loophole on ‘Carried Interest’

author: Richard Rubin
title: U.S. to Block Tax-Law Loophole on ‘Carried Interest’
text:
WASHINGTON—Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin said the government will act within two weeks to block a hedge-fund maneuver around part of the new tax law.

The tax law changed the rules governing what’s known as carried interest received by investment fund managers. Hedge-fund managers and others must now hold their investments for three years instead of one to qualify for lower capital-gains tax rates on their share of the profits. That’s a much narrower restriction than lawmakers had previously discussed, but even that change...
